name: Cozy Cat Cafe (pigeonaut)
description:
Cozy Cat Cafe

For Brandy.

A game about serving drinks to cats for the Nintendo Gameboy!

In this game you will play as Brandy the barista. She is volunteering at the Cozy Cat Café this summer. Serve drinks as fast as possible and don't make any of the cats mad or they will complain to your manager!

Download the .gb ROM file below OR play right now in the web browser above!

(Playing on original hardware will give you the best experience!)

  Controls: 

Move(d-pad): WASD

A button(interact): L

B button (back): K

  Credits:

Created by:

Kevin Neilson

 Art by:

GibbonGL

seethingswarm

Parabellum Games

Reakain 

 Sound Effects by:

Coffee 'Valley' Bat

 Music, "No Tips :(" written by:

Kevin Neilson

  Afterword:

This is 1 of 4 games I built for my friends this year for Christmas! 

Cozy Cat Café was built for my girlfriend Brandy. 

She loves cats and chill games! Thanks Brandy for giving me the inspiration to not only build, but finish a game this year!!! Also thanks SO much for play testing all of the other game gifts!
